title: Pixel 4a not available even in the Diwali sale on Flipkart Please Help us customers get products
content:
Have been trying to get the pixel 4a since the start of the Big billion days (16/10)
Flipkart's website has always showing the product to be unavailable for the pincode  :(
Tried to buy the phone at the start minute of the Diwali sale (29/10) still couldn't get it and heavily disappointed.
